EmailTemplate.name: TruthinIT Follow Up 11_7_2013.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: TruthinIT Follow-Up: Overprovisioning is for Amateurs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’re writing to follow up to another fantastic TruthinIT seminar, where you likely saw VMTurbo co-founder, Yuri Rabover, speak about the importance of workload rightsizing to avoid overprovisioning in the virtual datacenter.
Download this complimentary whitepaper http://bit.ly/1iRVqdK to find out how you can increase resource utilization and staff productivity by 20% and more by deploying intelligent workload management to optimize configurations and maximize resource efficiency.
Sincerely, VMTurbo Team
